author: clarwang
title: Beautiful Duplex House with Mini-Wheel Car
review: I have owned and loved this set since I was a kid, and have saved it from childhood.  I love the small basement windows, the use of tiles, and a fully molded tree for landscaping, red fencing with gates that move, plus you get the two old fashioned TV antennas, too.  I like the printed numbers for the unit addresses, and I used the number "4" printed 1x1 brick for a "number 4 Privet Drive" MOC of mine.  This is a classic, vintage, charming, and beautiful model.
